belarus.notes: (Decree No. 28 of 2002 Section 32. \"It is banned to sell tobacco products to citizens (by citizens) of the Republic of Belarus, foreign citizens and individuals with no citizenship under 18 years old.\")

fribourg.notes: Selling or supplying any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful. If a customer appears to be under the age of 16 years the salesperson must check a valid ID.

northwestterritories.notes: No person shall sell or supply, or offer to sell or supply, tobacco or a tobacco accessory to a person under the age of 18. No one under the age of 18 years shall purchase or attempt to purchase tobacco or a tobacco accessory.

manitoba.notes: It is illegal to sell, give, buy for, lend or otherwise provide tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. Parents can provide tobacco products to their children on private property. Further it is legal to supply tobacco to a minor if it is solely for use in traditional Aboriginal spiritual or cultural practices or ceremonies.

albania.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply tobacco products to minors under the age of 18 years.

poland.notes: Minors are not allowed to buy tobacco products.

botswana.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to minors under the age of 18. Any person who sells, by retail, any tobacco product, shall display clearly, for the public, a notice to the effect that the sale of any tobacco product to a person under the age of 18 years is prohibited.

costarica.notes: Tobacco products may not be sold to minors. Wholesale or retail vendors of products shall have the obligation, at their own expense, to display posters that are visible, clear and prominently placed on the inside of places of sale, stating that the sale of tobacco products to minors is prohibited.

venezuela.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply tobacco products to a minor anyone under 18.

moldova.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to anyone under the age of 18 years.

estonia.notes: The minimum age to purchase tobacco products or to smoke in public is set at 18. Minors may not be in possession of, or handle tobacco products.

russia.notes: Retail sales of tobacco products to any person under the age of 18 years are an offence.

ontario.notes: No person shall sell or supply tobacco to a person who is less than 19 years old. No person shall sell or supply tobacco to a person who appears to be less than 25 years old unless he or she has required the person to provide identification and is satisfied that the person is at least 19 years old.

sweden.notes: It is illegal to sell or commercially distribute tobacco to a person under the age of 18 years. No minimum age prior to 1 January 1997.

glarus.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful. If a customer appears to be under the age of 16 years the salesperson must check a valid ID.

mauritius.notes: A person must be 18 years old to purchase or to smoke cigarettes including any tobacco products as is indicated in Public Health (Restrictions on Tobacco Products) Regulations 1999, Sec. 2(e)(i)).

novascotia.notes: No vendor or employee of a vendor shall sell or give tobacco or a tobacco product to a person under the age of nineteen years. No person shall purchase tobacco or a tobacco product on behalf of, or for the purpose of resale or give tobacco or a tobacco product, to a person under the age of nineteen years. No person under the age of nineteen years may possess tobacco.

cuba.notes: Minors cannot legally buy tobacco, but stores may sell it to those who look 13 or older.

obwalden.notes: No cantonal regulation towards sale and supply of tobacco products to minors.

schwyz.notes: No cantonal regulation towards sale and supply of tobacco products to minors.

dominicanrepublic.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to a person under the age of 18 years.

armenia.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products anyone under the age of 18 years. Minors may not sell tobacco products. No minimum age prior to 24 December 2004.

unitedkingdom.notes: England and Wales: It is illegal to sell tobacco to anyone under the age of 18. The minimum age to smoke in public is 16 and authorities have the duty to seize any tobacco or cigarette papers in the possession of any person apparently under the age of 16. Minimum age to purchase was 16 from 1908 to 1 October 2007. No minimum age prior to 1908.

values.title: Smoking Age
values.value: 18 (purchase de jure) 16 (public possession & purchase de facto)

values.title: Purchasing Age
values.value: 18 (purchase de jure) 16 (public possession & purchase de facto)

gibraltar.notes: It is illegal to sell and furnish tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. Any police officer may confiscate tobacco from a minor in public. The minimum age was 16 years prior to 7 July 2006.

yukon.notes: The Tobacco and Vaping Products Control and Regulation Act, effective March 5, 2020, replaced the 2008 Smoke-free Places Act. The new act includes the regulation of vaping and vapour products.

schaffhausen.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful.

ethiopia.notes: \"No person may directly or indirectly give, provide or sell any tobacco product to a person under the age of 18.\"

basel-landschaft.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful. If a customer appears to be under the age of 18 years the salesperson must check a valid ID.

austria.notes: The minimum age is regulated by each federal state, but is nationwide 18 years. It is illegal in every state to sell or give tobacco products to a person under the age of 18 years as well as the consumption by a person under the age of 18 years in any public place.

northmacedonia.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to anyone under the age of 18 years.

ecuador.notes: It is illegal to sell or let sell tobacco to or by a minor.

spain.notes: It is illegal to sell any tobacco product or other smoking substances (e.g. electronic cigarettes) to a person under the age of 18 years. Minimum age was 16 in most regions prior to 1 January 2006.

algeria.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to minors under the age of 19 years. (Chapitre IV sur les probl\u00E8mes de sant\u00E9 l'article 93: \"la vente de tabac ou produits du tabac aux mineurs est interdite\".) The legal age to buy tobacco products has been 19 years since June 1984.

southafrica.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply any tobacco product to a person under the age of 18.

luzern.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful.

portugal.notes: It is illegal to sell or give any tobacco product to a minor as well as the consumption of a tobacco product in any public place by a minor. There is a proposition to ban vending machines in places accessible to people younger than 18. Minimum age was 16 prior to 1 January 2008.

princeedwardisland.notes: No person shall sell or supply tobacco to a person under the age of 21 years. No person shall purchase or attempt to purchase tobacco on behalf of, or for the purpose of resale to, a person under the age of 21 years. It is legal to supply tobacco to a minor if it is solely for use in traditional Aboriginal spiritual or cultural practices or ceremonies. The minimum legal age for tobacco sales was raised from 19 to 21 on March 1, 2020, after a private members' bill passed third reading on November 21, 2019 and Royal Assent given on November 28, 2019. The bill exempted individuals born on or before March 1, 2001.

lithuania.notes: No minimum age to smoke prior to 1 May 2015.

nunavut.notes: No person shall sell or supply, or offer to sell or supply, tobacco to a person who is less than 19 years old.

vaud.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful.

kenya.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. There is no minimum age to possess tobacco or smoke in public.

hungary.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18. It is illegal to smoke under the age of 18. The sale of tobacco is prohibited within 200 m of schools and health care units.

panama.notes: The sale of tobacco products to minors is prohibited.

greece.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to minors.

paraguay.notes: It is unlawful to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years.

luxembourg.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. No minimum age prior to 1 January 2006. Minimum purchase age increased from 16 to 18 on 1 August 2017.

thurgau.notes: Selling or supplying any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful. If a customer appears to be under the age of 16 years the salesperson must check a valid ID.

cyprus.notes: It is illegal to sell or otherwise provide tobacco products to a minor. \"(...)any person who provides a tobacco product to a minor is guilty of offense and in any case of his/her conviction, he/she shall be subject to a penalty not exceeding one thousand pounds or to incarceration not exceeding six months and/or to both penalties.\"

aargau.notes: It is an offence to sell or supply (except for Parents) any tobacco product to a person under 16 years of age.

colombia.notes: It is forbidden for any individual or legal entity to directly or indirectly sell tobacco products and its derivatives in any of its presentations to minors under the age of 18 years. In case of question, one must ask each tobacco purchaser to show that he has reached majority age.

italy.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. Violation is punished with a fine between \u20AC250.00 and \u20AC1000.00. If the law is violated more than once the fine is increased to \u20AC500.00 and \u20AC2,000.00 and a revocation of the tobacco license for at least 3 months. Minimum age for electronic cigarettes was 16 prior to 1 May 2013.

finland.notes: Prior to October 2010 it was not illegal for minors to smoke in public. The minimum age was 16 years prior to 1 March 1995.

newfoundlandandlabrador.notes: It is illegal to sell, give or furnish, directly or indirectly, tobacco to a person under the age of 19 years.

newbrunswick.notes: It is illegal to sell and supply tobacco products to anyone under the age of 19 years. It is also illegal to attempt to purchase tobacco on behalf of, or for the purpose of resale to, a person under the age of 19 years.

azerbaijan.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. The packaging of tobacco products must contain a warning that sale to minors is prohibited. No minimum age prior to 1 January 2002.

stgallen.notes: Selling or supplying any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful. If a customer appears to be under the age of 16 years the salesperson must check a valid ID.

nigeria.notes: It is illegal to sell, give or otherwise supply tobacco products to a minor.

sudan.notes: It is illegal to sell or give tobacco to a minor. Anyone under the age of 18 may also not handle, store, work or produce with tobacco or within such a facility.

values.title: Smoking Age
values.value: None 18 (to enter smoking room or facility)

chad.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to a minor. Minors and pregnant women may not smoke in public.

liberia.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply tobacco to a minor. Minors may not consume tobacco at any public place.

djibouti.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to a minor under the age of 16 years. A notice with the sale restrictions has to be placed at point of sale.

rwanda.notes: It is prohibited to involve a person under 18 in the buying, selling and exchanging of tobacco and tobacco products. It is also prohibited for the seller to sell tobacco and tobacco products to a person under 18.

quebec.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to anyone under the age of 18 years. The operator of a tobacco retail outlet may not give tobacco to a minor. The operator of a tobacco retail outlet may not sell tobacco to an adult, if the operator knows the person is purchasing the tobacco for a minor.

uri.notes: Selling or supplying any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful.

libya.notes: It is strictly prohibited to sell any tobacco product to a person under the age of 18 years.

valais.notes: Selling or supplying any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful. Currently the cantonal government is planning to raise the minimum age to 18 years.

antiguaandbarbuda.notes: Antigua and Barbuda doesn't have any restrictions towards selling tobacco to minors or smoking in general.

bosniaandherzegovina.notes: It is illegal to sell and gift tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. It is illegal for minors under the age of 18 years to gift, sell and consume tobacco products. The minimum age was 15 years prior to 28 September 2004. No minimum age prior to 9 March 1998.

basel-stadt.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful. If a customer appears to be under the age of 18 years the salesperson must check a valid ID.

ticino.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful.

trinidadandtobago.notes: Tobacco shall not be sold to or by a child under the age of 18 years.

neuchâtel.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful.

elsalvador.notes: It is illegal to sell or give tobacco to a minor.

norway.notes: No age limit for use of tobacco but no sales of cigarettes or Swedish snus to people under 18 by law. Vending machines are only allowed when they are cited inside an approved store, with a demand of buying a receipt from the cashier first.

nidwalden.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful.

uganda.notes: It is now illegal for a person below the age of 21 to access cigarettes.

uruguay.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to a minor. A clearly legible notice with the sale ban to under anyone under the age of 18 years has to be placed inside and outside the premises.

solothurn.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful.

niger.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to a minor. Minors may not enter any smoking room or facility where smoking is permitted by law. No minimum age prior to 17 July 2008.

values.title: Smoking Age
values.value: None 18 (to enter smoking room or facility)

bulgaria.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years.

jura.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply tobacco to a minor.

zug.notes: Selling any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful.

guatemala.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. Public consumption of tobacco by minors is prohibited. (El decreto 90\u201397, C\u00F3digo de Salud, indica en su art\u00EDculo 50)

bern.notes: Selling or giving any tobacco product to a minor is unlawful. If a customer appears to be under the age of 18 years the salesperson must check a valid ID.

values.title: Smoking Age
values.value: None 18 (to enter smoking facility or premises)

georgia.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to minors under the age of 18.

argentina.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to minors.

czechrepublic.notes: Selling tobacco products to anyone under 18 is prohibited. Sale of tobacco products and tobacco through vending machines is permitted if the tobacco purchase age is not violated. The seller shall place a clearly visible notice displaying the sale restrictions of tobacco to person under the age of 18. A person selling tobacco must be 18 years or older, unless the minor is preparing for a future career in the hotel or tourism industry, as a cook-waiter or salesman. However, it is very easy to get tobacco products for minors as many sellers don't check the age. The minimum age was 16 years prior to 2 September 1999.

togo.notes: It is illegal to sell or give any tobacco product to a minor.

liechtenstein.notes: It is illegal for anyone under the age of 16 to possess or consume tobacco products.

swaziland.notes: It is illegal to sell and give tobacco to anyone under the age of 18 years.

france.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. Minors under the age of 18 years may not smoke in any school or on school property. Vending machines outside a tobacco shop is prohibited. Prior to 21 July 2009 the minimum age to purchase tobacco products was 16 years of age.

burundi.notes: It is illegal to sell cigarettes to anyone under the age of 18. Other tobacco products are not regulated.

serbia.notes: The sale to persons under 18 is prohibited. Contrary to that, a lot of salesmen sell cigarettes to minors in Serbia. Acquiring tobacco products is very easy for minors despite the law.

slovakia.notes: Tobacco sales to under 18 year olds are prohibited.

belgium.notes: (\"It is forbidden to sell tobacco products to young people under the age of 18 and advertising for tobacco products is forbidden.\")

tanzania.notes: It is unlawful to sell or give tobacco products to a minor, and to smoke such tobacco products if the individual is younger than 18 years.

netherlands.notes: The sale of tobacco to persons under 18 is illegal. Smoking of tobacco is prohibited by law in all public buildings and in public transport. As of 1 January 2004 every employee has the right to work in a smoke-free environment. All forms of tobacco advertising, promotion or sponsorship are prohibited. Smoking remains prevalent in the Netherlands despite these efforts. Tobacco can be bought at every supermarket and at other stores.

senegal.notes: It is illegal to sell or give tobacco to a person under the age of 18 years. (Chapitre III.- Acc\u00E8s aux produits du tabac: Article 17 Il est interdit de vendre ou d'offrir aux mineurs ou de faire vendre ou de faire offrir par les mineurs du tabac ou tout produit du tabac.)

britishvirginislands.notes: It is illegal to sell or offer to sell tobacco to anyone under the age of 18 years. It is not illegal for minors to purchase, possess or consume tobacco.

caymanislands.notes: Tobacco Law, 2007 PART V \u2013 Section 10: No person shall sell tobacco to a minor.

zambia.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to anyone under age 16. No minimum age for consumption and possession in public. No minimum age prior to 1 January 1993.

comoros.notes: The sale of tobacco products to minors is prohibited. Vendors of tobacco products must visibly and prominently display at their point of sale a notice of prohibition of the sale of tobacco to minors and by minors.

namibia.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply tobacco to a minor. No minimum age prior to 14 April 2010.

croatia.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco products to minors. It is the responsibility of any salesperson to ensure that no tobacco is sold to minors and therefore to request an ID to make sure that the purchaser is at least 18 years of age. Minors may not sell tobacco products.

canada.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply tobacco products to a minor under the age of 18. The minimum age was 16 years of prior to 1994.

honduras.notes: The sale and gifting of tobacco-derived products to persons under 21 years of age is prohibited.

chile.notes: It is illegal to sell any form of tobacco to a person under the age of 18 years.

bermuda.notes: No person shall sell or supply any cigarettes, tobacco or tobacco products to a minor. A person selling or supplying any cigarettes, tobacco or tobacco products to a person who appears to be under 25 years of age shall, before selling or supplying them, ensure, by requiring photo identification, that the latter person is not a minor.

brazil.notes: It is illegal to \"sell Products whose ingredients can cause physical or psychic dependence, even if only through improper use\" (...). This also includes tobacco products of any kind.

appenzellausserrhoden.notes: It is an offence to sell or supply any tobacco product to a person under 16 years of age.

guyana.notes: No tobacco may be sold or furnished to a minor.

germany.notes: The Protection of Young Persons Act states that children and young people under 18 years of age shall not be sold tobacco products nor should they be permitted to smoke in public. This does not apply to married adolescents. Minimum age was 18 from 10 June 1943 until 1 January 1952. Minimum age was 16 from 1 January 1952 to 1 September 2007.

romania.notes: There is a ban on sale of tobacco to those younger than 18. Vending machines selling tobacco are banned. There is no minimum legal age of smoking.

peru.notes: The sale of tobacco products to/by minors under the age of 18 is prohibited.

angola.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to minors under the age of 18.

unitedstates.notes: Since 2020, the smoking age in all U.S. states, territories and the District of Columbia has been 21. For more information, see Smoking ages in the United States.

denmark.notes: The minimum age was 16 years prior to 1 September 2008.

saskatchewan.notes: It is illegal to sell, lend, assign, give or send tobacco to anyone under the age of 18 years. It's the only province with a smoking age that differs from its drinking age.

latvia.notes: The sale of tobacco products to persons under the age of 18 is prohibited.

zürich.notes: Selling or supplying any tobacco product to a person under the age of 16 is unlawful. If a customer appears to be under the age of 16 years the salesperson must check a valid ID.

slovenia.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to anyone under the age of 18. ID-Card or passport has to be shown if requested.

democraticrepublicofthecongo.notes: It is illegal for minors to smoke in public, and for anyone to give or sell tobacco to a minor. (ARRETE MINISTERIEL N\u00B01250 Article 1: L'usage, la vente, l'achat et la consommation du tabac, de ses produits et de ses d\u00E9riv\u00E9s sont strictement interdits aux mineurs.)

zimbabwe.notes: It is illegal to sell or give tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18. Minors may not sell tobacco.

egypt.notes: The sale of tobacco products to persons under the age of 18 is prohibited.

malta.notes: \"No person shall sell, supply or distribute by way of compensation or otherwise, any cigarettes, cigars, tobacco, tobacco products or smoking requisites to any person who is under the age of 18 years, or in any manner induce such person to smoke.\"

iceland.notes: It is illegal to sell or deliver tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18 years. Minors may not handle or sell tobacco products. No minimum age prior to 1 January 1985. The minimum age was 16 years from 1 January 1985 to 1 October 1996.

montenegro.notes: It is illegal to sell tobacco to anyone under the age of 18. A poster with the sale restrictions must be placed at point of sale.

alberta.notes: It is illegal to sell or supply tobacco products to a minor under the age of 18.

bolivia.notes: The sale of tobacco products to minors under the age of 18 years is prohibited.

appenzellinnerrhoden.notes: No cantonal regulation towards sale and supply of tobacco products to minors.

ireland.notes: The sale of tobacco to persons under 18 is illegal. It is illegal to buy or smoke cigarettes if under the age of 18. The minimum age was 16 years prior to 27 March 2002.
